name: Top Down_Prototype
description:
Move and shoot  a horde of ennemies in my first game. 

Controls :

- Keyboard

Move Left, Move Right : A, D

Move UP, Move Down : W, S

Shoot : UP, Down, Left, Right

Pause the Game : P

- Gamepad 

Move Left, Move Right :  Left X-axis  

Move UP, Move Down : Left Y-axis 

Shoot : Right Y and X axis

Pause the Game : Start button
